attributes.action: Provide at least a basic level of respite care for families where a child has been diagnosed with ADHD.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Provision to be made for families and children with adhd to have respite care. The condition needs to be more widely recognised so that money can be used to fund occasional -at least- breaks for the family & the child. The stress caused by the effects of adhd needs recognition and quickly. It is time that the condition was taken seriously, and not dismissed as the child just being naughty.
